programme.title: A Sordid Struggle
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke examines the legal battle fought by Cuban Elian Gonzalez for asylum.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke examines the legal battle to declare six year old Cuban Elian Gonzalez eligible for permanent asylum in the US and the political ramifications of the case.
